basics.name: Ethan Chung
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

volunteer.summary: Assist in teaching various programming concepts to ICS students
highlights: Teach students about various technical interview techniques
Go over various data structures and algorithms

volunteer.summary: Assist in the ICS 211 course as an assistant to the teacher assistant.
highlights: Help students understand computer science concepts
Aid students in debugging their code

awards.title: Manoa Academic Honors
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.8 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2022. See my portfolio site for more details.
